entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 10:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: N 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy except cloudy south of Plum Point with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy south of Plum Point in the morning. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening then northeast 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
